basics.label: Director of Finance
basics.summary: Seasoned Certified Management Accountan and financial leader with deep and broad health care industry experience in forecasting, financial planning and analysis, operations, reporting, and strategic planning

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Financial planning and analysis leadership and support for Consumer Service, Claims...
highlights: Financial oversight of onshore and offshore vendor relationships with an annual budget of approximately $120M...
Served as the finance lead on the consolidation of Medicare and Retirement Customer Service organization, with an annual budget of $120M, into Benefit Operations...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Financial oversight for various Operations organizations across nine internal sites...
highlights: Successfully reduced actual operating expense in the service centers by $24M...
Completed a cost benefit analysis demonstrating the implementation of IVR technology equated to $650,000 in annual savings...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led a team of 6 Senior Business Analysts. Developed partnerships with other departments...
highlights: Implemented advanced capacity planning software which resulted in optimized hiring of staff...
Designed and implemented Operational reporting for both intake agents and clinical case managers which led to improved performance and reduction in cost...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Created and updated short and long term staffing models and capacity planning documents...
highlights: Participated on a project consolidating 12 call centers into two accounting for overall savings of $5M annually...
Developed partnerships with other departments, including Finance, Training, Sales, and Account and Product Management to improve forecast accuracy to 97%...

interests.name: Hennepin Technical Community College Accounting Advisory Board Member
